original_title: Now and Then: From Frosh to Seniors
overview: Daniel Geller - NOW & THEN is a four-year journey through the American rite of passage known as college. This feature-length documentary follows ten undergraduates at Stanford University from move-in day to graduation, from their last days as teenagers to their first days as adults. NOW & THEN is at once a reflection on college life and a portrait of ten diverse twenty-somethings traversing the path to adulthood. -
title: Now and Then: From Frosh to Seniors
